com.logiccity.minecraft.api

Interface GameControl


  • public interface GameControl
    The interface for controlling the player or game states

      • marchAttackEntity

        boolean marchAttackEntity(java.lang.String chosenName,
                          int waitMs)
        March toward and attack the named entity
        Parameters:
        chosenName - entity name
        waitMs - the minimal wait time in milliseconds between consecutive attacks
        Returns:
        target dead or can't be attacked

        y - new y location
        z - new z location

      • sendBlockPlacementPacket

        void sendBlockPlacementPacket(int x,
                              int y,
                              int z,
                              int placeDir)
        Send block placement packet to the server
        Parameters:
        x - the x of the block being clicked
        y - the y of the block being clicked
        z - the z of the block being clicked
        placeDir - the clicked face of the block

      • buildOneBlock

        void buildOneBlock(int[] relativePos,
                   float yaw,
                   double x,
                   double y,
                   double z)
        Build one block based on the coordinates passed in
        Parameters:
        relativePos - an integer array with relative x, y, z and an optional side face
        yaw - the yaw of player
        x - x offset
        y - y offset
        z - z offset

      • recordBuildingSteps

        void recordBuildingSteps(java.lang.String name)
        Start to record player's block placements/destructions
        Parameters:
        name - the name used to identify the recorded steps

      • recordAllSteps

        void recordAllSteps(java.lang.String name)

        Parameters:
        name - the name used to identify the recorded activities
